task_definition_name: Show Error Message Whenever Transfer Request Fails
description:
Summary:
Whenever a user is making any type of Transfer and If the request failed due to some reasons like No Internet or Socket Exception etc. It's showing empty Snack Bar without a message. It should show message Unable to make Transfer, Please Transfer later

Steps to reproduce:
Go to Transfer in Navigation and enter details and disconnect the internet.

Expected behavior:
It should show a proper message, So the user should know what happened, why a user can't make transfer right now.

Observed behavior:
It's showing empty Snack Bar
